raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that players of color have a higher percentage 

What do you wonder?
I wonder why players in color have a higher percentage 

What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts me and my community because of racism. There’s clearly something going on and a reason why there’s not so many coaches of color 

What’s going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
Colored coaches vs players
ace_sentences: I notice that players of color have a higher percentage.
I wonder why players of color have a higher percentage.
I think that racism causes this situation.
There are not many coaches of color.
There is a reason why there are not many coaches of color.
The headline is: Colored coaches vs players.
